code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Sidebar from'./components/Sidebar';import TopBar from'./components/TopBar';import ProjectTaskBoard from'./components/ProjectTaskBoard';import ClientMessages from'./components/ClientMessages';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./DashboardLayout.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardLayout=_ref=>{let{messages,setMessages,showToast}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const[showMyProjects,setShowMyProjects]=useState(false);const[search,setSearch]=useState('');const handleShowMyProjects=()=>setShowMyProjects(true);const handleShowAllProjects=()=>setShowMyProjects(false);const handleSearch=query=>setSearch(query);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-layout",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sidebar,{onMyProjects:handleShowMyProjects,onShowAllProjects:handleShowAllProjects,messages:messages,setMessages:setMessages}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-main-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopBar,{onSearch:handleSearch,showToast:typeof showToast==='function'?showToast:undefined}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectTaskBoard,{showMyProjects:showMyProjects,search:search})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientMessages,{messages:messages,setMessages:setMessages})]});};export default DashboardLayout;
